title: GHL/SWAS Offer Consultation
description:
We have a client opportunity to create multiple offers using GHL and additional (outbound marketing services) innovative/SWAS-like, and they are seeking expertise with someone who has extensive experience in creating offers in go high level that includes services and monthly fees. 

They are looking to create multiple levels of the program: including a DIY, and DWY version/ option, 

All of the elements have been identified, however they are looking for specifics on set-up, snapshot contents And value pricing… Mega-Offer Leadership!

Exciting new (Outbound) growth services Packaged up GHL-style… can you help here? Do you have GHL offer experience?

title: Automation & Design (Canva, OpenAI, Make.com), Copywriter, Marketing Assistant
description:
We are an e-commerce brand looking for a reliable and creative Marketing Assistant to help us grow our online presence and organize content using Canva Premium, OpenAI, and Make.com.

This job is for someone who is skilled with digital tools, loves design and marketing, and can work with what we already have to build something even better. We sell unique products and want our brand to feel modern, thoughtful, and high-quality—both online and when customers open their packages.

🌟 What You’ll Do:
	•	Help plan and schedule social media posts (Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, Facebook, etc.) for the next 30–60 days
	•	Use Canva Premium to design graphics, short videos, mailers, and printed materials (like thank-you cards or product guides)
	•	Use OpenAI Playground or ChatGPT to help write or improve content
	•	Set up automation workflows using Make.com to make posting and content creation faster and easier
	•	Organize and use our existing brand content library to make sure everything stays on-brand
	•	Help protect and upscale digital artwork (for our artist products and designs)

✅ You’re a Good Fit If You:
	•	Can read and write English well (strong grammar and understanding of tone are important)
	•	Have experience with Canva Premium, Make.com, and AI tools (like ChatGPT or OpenAI Playground)
	•	Can work independently but also ask questions when needed
	•	Understand how to design for both digital and printed materials
	•	Have a good eye for colors, layout, and simple design that feels high-end and clean
	•	Are detail-oriented and can follow branding guidelines closely

We’re a growing brand focused on niche wellness products, digital artwork, and unique gifts. Our style is minimal but cozy, luxurious but friendly. You’ll be working directly with the owner (me!) and can grow with the brand over time if it’s a good match.

title: GHL Funnel Builder for Educational Webinars/Events
description: We are seeking an experienced GHL funnel builder to create effective webinar and event funnels focused on the education sector. The ideal candidate must be fluent in both Russian and English, and should be able to demonstrate past successful funnel projects. This position offers the potential for long-term collaboration. If you have a strong background in funnel building and a passion for education, we would love to see your portfolio and discuss how you can contribute to our goals.

title: Social Media Content Creator for Constitutional Podcast (Part-Time, Project-Based)
description:
Are you passionate about freedom, the Constitution, and preserving American values? Do you have experience creating content that drives engagement, builds loyal communities, and grows online audiences?

We’re looking for a creative, freedom-loving content creator to help grow our Constitutionalist, right-leaning podcast. The role will begin as a project-based freelance position (a few hours per week), with potential to expand into website content, editing support, and long-term collaboration—if your efforts help us scale.

ABOUT US:
Our podcast is focused on truth, liberty, and restoring the principles this country was founded on. We cover topics like:
-Constitutional law and current events
-Political corruption and deep state agendas
-Big Pharma, media manipulation, and censorship
-Sovereignty, faith, and the role of the individual in restoring the Republic

ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES:
-Create weekly social media content (graphics, captions, post ideas, short video clips or reels)
-Pull available clips from podcast episodes to create engaging content 
-Boost engagement across platforms (X, Instagram, Rumble, Youtube)
-Suggest strategies for organic growth and increased listenership
-Align content with the tone and values of the show

IDEAL CANDIDATE:
-Is aligned with Constitutional and liberty-first values
-Has a strong grasp of social media strategy, especially for podcasts or political/alt-media accounts
-Can create eye-catching content and understands engagement psychology
-Bonus: experience with light video/audio editing, Canva, Substack, or basic web publishing

This is a great opportunity for someone who wants to be part of something meaningful and grow alongside a mission-driven brand. If you’re creative, reliable, and believe in what we’re doing—we’d love to hear from you. 

** If the podcast grows, so does the opportunity. We are still fairly new to the podcast game, but my goal is to slowly turn this from a hobby to a side source of income. If that happens, this role will expand. GREAT opportunity for someone looking to grow their brand building resume.

To apply, please:
- Submit 1 Sample Post
Create one sample social media post (text + visual idea) that could be used to promote an episode titled: “Is America Still a Republic?”
Keep the tone bold, clear, and liberty-focused — something that would resonate with constitutionalist, freedom-loving listeners. You can use a free tool like Canva if you’d like to mock up a graphic, or just describe the visual concept.

- Answer These 3 Questions:
         1. What platforms do you have the most experience 
              growing, and what tactics have worked best for you?
         2. How do you personally align with the values of this 
              podcast and its mission?
         3. What is one idea you’d try in the first 30 days to grow 
              our listener base?

title: Setting up a law firm
description:
I recently opened my own law office as a solo practitioner, and I am aiming to create the most efficient, automated, and AI-driven infrastructure for my firm, currently focusing on immigration law. Additionally, I plan to redesign my current website. I want to design my firm in a way that I can delegate or outsource all the non-legal work to others based on the new infrastructure. I am looking to grow my firm in the future. I intend to use and interconnect the following tools in the following steps, unless you have better suggestions. 

Phase 1: Client Intake & Case Creation 
- ✅ Set Up Automated Intake: Configure LawDroid chatbot for handling inquiries and intake forms.
- ✅ Streamline Call Management: Implement Smith.ai to manage phone calls and schedule consultations.
- ✅ Automate Appointment Confirmations: Connect Lawmatics AI for reminders and scheduling.
- ✅ Integrate Intake with Case Management: Use Zapier to send Lawmatics AI data to Clio, triggering case creation.
Phase 2: Case Management & Document Preparation
- ✅ Optimize Immigration Form Processing: Sync Clio with Eimmigration for auto-filling forms.
- ✅ Establish Secure Document Transfers: Ensure Eimmigration (or Docketwise) transfers completed forms to NetDocuments.
- ✅ Automate Payments & Invoicing: Link Lawmatics AI to LawPay, then configure Zapier for payment tracking.
Phase 3: AI-Assisted Legal Research & Case Strategy 
- ✅ Enable AI Research Tools: Activate Casetext’s CoCounsel for case law analysis and ROSS Intelligence for risk assessment.
- ✅ Predict Case Outcomes: Implement Lex Machina to analyze judge rulings.
- ✅ Sync Research Insights with Case Management: Use Zapier to feed legal research findings into Clio for real-time strategy updates.
Phase 4: Financial & Compliance Management
- ✅ Automate Accounting: Set up Pilot AI Accounting to sync billable hours from Clio.
- ✅ Secure Payment Processing: Configure LawPay for seamless invoicing.
- ✅ Enhance Cybersecurity & Compliance: Deploy AbacusNext AI with NetDocuments for security alerts.
Phase 5: AI-Powered Marketing & Client Outreach 
- ✅ Boost Online Presence: Optimize SEO with FindLaw AI for improved client acquisition.
- ✅ Automate Social Media Engagement: Use Buffer AI for content scheduling.
- ✅ Refine Advertising Strategies: Analyze inquiries with CallRail AI and sync insights with HubSpot CRM.
Phase 6: AI-Assisted Litigation & Predictive Analytics 
- ✅ Automate Legal Motions & Case Preparation: Use Harvey AI for document generation.
- ✅ Fine-Tune Litigation Strategy: Enable Lex Machina for judge ruling analysis.
- ✅ Assess Opposing Counsel Strategies: Leverage Premonition AI before hearings.
- ✅ Sync Litigation Insights with Case Management: Configure Zapier for real-time updates in Clio.

title: Ontraport Course Development Specialist Needed
description: I'm seeking a skilled professional to assist in building my coaching course using Ontraport. The ideal candidate should have experience in course creation, integrating learning materials, and setting up automated workflows within Ontraport. Your expertise will help streamline the process and enhance the learning experience for my clients. If you have a knack for instructional design and a strong understanding of Ontraport's features, I would love to hear from you!

title: Gravity Forms Guru Needed
description:
CMS Developer – Estate Planning Platform

Position: CMS Developer (Project-Based)

Company: Mindset2 / McIntyre Elder Law
Location: Remote (Preference for candidates near Charlotte, NC)

About the Project:
We are developing an innovative cloud-based estate planning drafting platform designed to automate client intake, streamline attorney consultations, and efficiently generate estate planning documents. We have already laid the groundwork with a client intake form using Gravity Forms (WordPress CMS) and require an experienced CMS Developer to optimize and expand our system, completing key functionality and accelerating our project timeline.

Key Responsibilities:

Review and optimize existing Gravity Forms-based client intake form to enhance efficiency, responsiveness, and user experience.

Complete and refine the client information form to ensure accuracy, intuitive logic, and effective data capture.

Develop and implement an attorney consultation form with conditional logic to guide attorneys seamlessly through the estate planning workflow.

Integrate forms and automate data flow to facilitate efficient document drafting and overall process management.

Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues to ensure seamless operation across the entire platform.

Collaborate directly with project lead (CEO/attorney) to meet specific project goals and timelines.

Qualifications:

Proven experience developing and optimizing complex forms and workflows within a CMS, specifically WordPress and Gravity Forms.

Strong understanding of form logic, conditional fields, data integration, and workflow automation.

Familiarity with estate planning or legal tech preferred but not required.

Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to deliver solutions quickly and effectively.

Strong communication skills and responsiveness for effective remote collaboration.

What We Offer:

Competitive project-based compensation.

Flexibility in working hours, remote work environment.

Opportunity to significantly impact the efficiency of estate planning practices.

Potential for H^ongoing^H collaboration and additional project phases.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume, examples of relevant past projects (especially form-intensive work), and a brief summary of how your experience aligns with our project needs.

We look forward to accelerating this project with your expertise!

title: AI-Powered Web Scraping for Tripadvisor and Similar Sites
description: We are seeking a skilled freelancer proficient in AI-driven web scraping techniques. The ideal candidate will extract and analyze data from Tripadvisor and similar platforms, delivering structured datasets that can be utilized for market research and competitive analysis. A deep understanding of web scraping tools and AI methodologies is essential. If you have experience in this field and can ensure compliance with website policies, we would love to hear from you.

title: Metricool Social Media Consultant Needed for intro and overview
description: I am seeking an experienced Metricool consultant to help us enhance our social media strategy. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Metricool's features and how to leverage them for analytics, scheduling, and reporting. You will collaborate with our marketing team to analyze current performance metrics and provide actionable insights for improvement. If you are a proactive problem-solver with a passion for social media, I would love to hear from you! I am brand new to Metricool and need a good coach/intro person to help get me started and show me the ropes. I will be using Metricool to oversee social media for several podcasts/brands all under one roof/control panel

title: Quality Assurance Specialist (Wix)
description:
Hi! 

We are a small agency that engineers custom code solutions for WiX websites. We are looking for a Quality Assurance Specialist to join our QA team, test websites and assure that they fulfill the client's requirements/ identify bugs. (From a design, UX, functionality perspective)

Requirements:
- QA experience.
- Project management skills.
- Ability to test on multiple devices and screen sizes
- Attention to detail.
- Wix experience- 1 year.

Workload:
Training period: 3-5 hours a week.
After full onboarding: 5-10 hours a week (may increase)

Please start your proposal with "WIXQA".

Thanks!

title: HVAC Shop Drawing for Retail Bakery Duct Layout
description: We are seeking an experienced HVAC designer to create detailed shop drawings for a retail bakery duct layout. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in HVAC design and experience in commercial kitchen environments. You will be responsible for ensuring that the duct system is optimized for proper airflow and efficiency while adhering to local building codes and regulations. Please provide examples of previous work in similar projects along with your application.

title: Real Estate- Telemarketing
description:
Real Estate Telemarketer (Remote/Work From Home)

Job Description:
We’re hiring Competitive Telemarketers to join our real estate investment team. In this role, you will use a multi-line dialer to contact property owners and follow a script to gauge their interest in selling based on our buying criteria.

Responsibilities:

Make outbound calls using a multi-line dialer

Follow a proven script to identify motivated sellers

Accurately take notes and update the CRM

Qualify leads and schedule follow-up calls for acquisitions team

Requirements:

Fluent English with excellent communication skills

Stable and reliable internet connection

Prior experience in real estate or outbound calling preferred

Quiet work environment and headset required

Must submit a 1-minute introduction video to be considered (Answer Screening Questions in Video)

title: Sitecore Author and Web Designer
description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and experienced Sitecore Author and Web Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate must possess a strong understanding of front-end web development principles, web design best practices, and have hands-on experience with Sitecore Content Editor, Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) CMS, and the Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign). You will be responsible for refreshing and redesigning web pages on the Sitecore Platform, ensuring a modern and user-friendly experience. 

Please read all REQUIRED Conditions below before applying
REQUIRED: Fluency in English and with near-perfect pronunciation (Very Important), excellent internet connection. Excellent phone, email and instant messaging communication skills.
REQUIRED: Minimum 2 years’ experience in web page authoring or designing, preferably using the Sitecore Platform.
REQUIRED: Experience with Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) CMS and Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign) is highly preferred.
REQUIRED: Must use Time-tracking software - Hubstaff (will be provided)
REQUIRED: Respond to the questions included in the job post.

Responsibilities:
- Refresh and redesign existing web pages within the Sitecore Content Editor, implement design changes and ensure seamless functionality, and web page authoring within Sitecore.
- Utilize AEM for content management and web page updates using AEM components and templates.
- Manage and update website content, ensuring accuracy and consistency.
- Create and optimize landing pages for specific campaigns.
- Apply strong web design principles to enhance user experience.
- Utilize Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign) to create and edit digital assets.
- Work closely with the team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality results.
- Troubleshoot user issues and help reach a resolution.
- Communicate effectively and provide timely updates.

Preferred Experiences and Skills:
- Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Multimedia Arts (Web Design) or related field is preferred.
- Proven experience in web authoring/designing with proficiency in Sitecore.
- Experience in using Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and Adobe Creative Suite (InDesign) is highly desirable.
- Solid understanding of C#, .NET, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals. Knowledge in SEO best practices is a plus.
- Excellent content management skills with experience in creating and managing landing pages.
- Excellent skills in both written and verbal communications.
- Excellent attention to detail and organizational & time-management skills.
- The ability to adapt to new technologies and learn quickly.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a global team.
- A desire to stay current with industry best practices.

Stretch Goals/Responsibilities:
- Potential to be hired for a position outside Upwork
- Contribute to the development of custom Sitecore components and templates
- Develop and maintain AEM components and templates to improve content authoring efficiency.
- Develop workflows to streamline the conversion of print materials to web content.

title: Legal Blog Writer Needed for SEO-Friendly Content
description:
We are a law firm seeking a talented legal blog writer to create clear and engaging content that simplifies complex legal topics for our audience. Your writing should not only be informative but also optimized for search engines to enhance visibility. If you have a knack for breaking down legal jargon into easily digestible articles and have experience in legal writing, we want to hear from you. Please provide samples of your previous work in legal writing or related fields.

**Relevant Skills:**
- Legal Writing
- SEO Optimization
- Research Skills
- Content Creation
- Audience Engagement

title: Expert GIS Scraper
description: I’m looking for someone who’s an expert at extracting data from the GIS software in different counties.  I’d like to extract data based on zoning, road frontage, etc.

description:
Looking for someone in Nuevo Leon, MX to help us with shipments for our clothing brand.

Duties would include

1. receiving/counting inventory inventory
2. picking and packing orders and shipping them out
3. receiving returns

-
ESPAÑOL:

Enviar nuestros pedidos locales de ropa en Nuevo Leon, MX

Estamos buscando a alguien en Nuevo Leon, MX para ayudarnos con los envíos de nuestra marca de ropa.

Las responsabilidades incluyen:

1. Recibir y contar el inventario.
2. Empacar los pedidos y enviarlos.

DEBES ser organizado/a, la parte más importante de este negocio es la precisión.

title: Sales Administrator & Facilitator
description:
About Ken’s Appliance
Ken’s Appliance is a trusted, family-owned retailer based in Grand Island, Nebraska. We specialize in appliances, furniture, and mattresses, proudly serving residential and commercial customers throughout Central Nebraska. With a commitment to excellence and efficiency, we are seeking a detail-oriented Remote Sales Administrator to support our growing sales team.

Position Summary
The Remote Sales Administrator will be a vital partner to our sales team, taking ownership of non-sales administrative tasks that allow our in-store salespeople to stay focused on closing deals and serving customers. You’ll handle paperwork, customer follow-ups, and backend logistics—ensuring smooth sales operations from lead to delivery.

Key Responsibilities
Sales Administration

Prepare and process sales orders, quotes, and customer contracts

Manage financing applications and ensure timely submission to lenders

Coordinate and maintain accurate CRM records and lead tracking

Schedule product deliveries and installations with internal logistics team

Customer Communication & Support

Follow up on inbound customer leads (via phone, text, or email) to qualify and route opportunities to salespeople

Assist with follow-up calls and emails for pending quotes, order updates, or documentation needs

Coordinate customer communication for complex contract jobs or multi-unit projects

Operational Coordination

Facilitate onboarding and product training logistics for sales team members

Maintain organized documentation of product specs, financing terms, warranties, and promotions

Assist in preparing vendor or manufacturer reports related to sales programs and SPIFs

Team Collaboration

Communicate daily with in-store sales staff to assist with time-sensitive administrative needs

Serve as the remote “air traffic controller” who keeps documentation and scheduling moving without delays

Qualifications
Proven experience in sales support, retail coordination, or administrative roles (preferably remote)

Exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills

Strong written and verbal communication abilities

Comfortable navigating CRM systems, Google Workspace, and productivity tools

Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, remote work environment

Appliance, furniture, or retail experience is a strong plus but not required

Working Hours
Flexible, with availability during core business hours (Monday–Saturday, Central Time)

Occasional weekend availability is preferred to support peak sales periods

title: Need Help Finalizing Community Site on Lovable (No-Code Platform)
description:
I’m looking for a tech-savvy assistant to help finalize a community-style website I’m building on the Lovable no-code platform.

The core layout and structure are already in place—I’ve got a clear framework for how it should look and function. The bottleneck is testing and refining user experiences by creating dummy profiles (personal and vendor) and troubleshooting issues as they pop up. I’ve been doing it myself, but it’s taking too much time I don’t have. I need someone who can jump in this week and help push this live.

Responsibilities:
• Build and test fake personal and vendor profiles
• Check functionality of profile creation, editing, and role-based logic
• Troubleshoot issues and work through limitations of Lovable
• Follow my existing visual and task framework
• Provide timely updates and be available for quick check-ins

You’re a good fit if:
• You’ve used platforms like Lovable, Softr, Bubble, or Webflow
• You’re organized and can follow direction but also think ahead
• You have an eye for UX/UI and enjoy problem-solving
• You’re available to work quickly and hit a tight deadline

This is a short project with potential follow-up work. I’ll go into full project details during interviews.

title: Team Lead for USA Solar Sales Venture
description:
Job Description:

We are launching our U.S.-based solar venture – Ecopoint Solar – and are seeking a highly motivated Team Lead / Venture Starter to help us rebuild and scale a lean, sales-only solar operation.

Important:

This is a USA-based solar business. You must have prior knowledge of U.S. solar sales processes, lead gen channels, or EPC coordination and getting installers on board. 

Your Role Will Involve:
Building the sales and operational foundation of Ecopoint Solar.

Recruiting and managing remote sales agents or appointment setters.

Coordinating with U.S.-based EPC/install partners for fulfillment.

Developing and optimizing scripts, workflows, follow-up sequences, and CRM processes.

Taking initiative to run this like your own startup with hands-on support from our CEO.

Ideal Candidate:
Has experience in solar sales (USA market only) or has worked with solar lead gen/startups before.

Strong English communication and leadership skills.

Self-starter mindset with ability to create processes, hire, and execute without micromanagement.

Familiar with platforms like GoHighLevel, Zoho, Bitrix24, or similar CRMs (optional but preferred).

Understands how to build lean, commission-based sales teams.

Compensation:
H^Hourly^H or H^fixed^H start during setup phase (negotiable based on value).

To Apply, Answer These Questions:
What is your experience with solar sales or solar lead generation for the U.S. market?

Have you ever helped build or lead a sales team from scratch?

What tools (CRM, outreach platforms) are you familiar with?

Why would this venture excite you?

title: China based Social Media Manager
description:
We need help setting up and running ads on various Chinese platforms, (wechat/little red book/baidu). I have a full time staff in my office that speaks Chinese as well. Should be easy to work together.

This will be long term - to turn into a full time position once the ads prove effective.

title: Sales Funnel Specialist for Functional Medicine Spa
description: We are seeking a skilled professional to design and implement effective sales funnels to drive traffic to our functional medicine spa. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating targeted marketing strategies that convert leads into clients. You will work closely with our team to understand our services and target audience, enabling you to craft compelling funnels that engage and convert. If you have a passion for health and wellness and a track record of successful funnel creation, we would love to hear from you.

title: ClickFunnels 2.0 Sales Funnel Builder (Long-Term Opportunity)
description:
I'm looking for a reliable, detail-oriented sales funnel builder with experience in ClickFunnels 2.0 to help me build funnels for my affiliate clients and consulting business.

🧩 About the Role:
You will be building sales funnels using ClickFunnels 2.0 based on my strategy, copy, and wireframes. Funnels are typically for coaches, consultants, and service-based businesses.

Types of funnels may include:

Opt-in funnels (lead magnets, free guides, etc.)
VSL funnels
Webinar funnels
Sales pages and thank-you pages

✅ Requirements:
Strong experience with ClickFunnels 2.0
Can follow detailed instructions and hit deadlines
Understands how funnels work to convert leads/sales (not just design)

Bonus: Familiar with email marketing tools

💼 Ideal Candidate:
Based in the Philippines, Pakistan, India, Latin America, Eastern Europe, or similar

Has built multiple funnels using ClickFunnels 2.0 (please include examples/screenshots)

Great communicator, detail-oriented, and dependable

Looking for consistent long-term work

💵 Payment Structure:
I’d like to start with a H^fixed^H-price test project — building one simple funnel (like an opt-in or VSL page).

Rate: $20–$35 depending on scope and complexity

If the first funnel goes well, I’m looking to bring someone on a monthly retainer to handle all future funnel builds and edits for my clients.

To Apply:
Please include:

A short intro about your experience with ClickFunnels 2.0
2–3 funnel examples or portfolio links/screenshots
Your rate for a simple opt-in funnel and availability
Why you’d be a great long-term fit for this role

title: Software Engineer - Setting up Tailscale
description:
We’re looking for a DevOps or backend engineer to help us set up Tailscale to securely access the customer’s internal API endpoints.
Need someone with immediate availability.

title: Canon EDSDK Python Script Debug - Camera Control Specialist
description:
Project Description:

  I need a developer to debug and enhance my Python scripts that uses Canon EDSDK for programmatic camera control. The script needs to properly handle camera awakening, photo capture via shutter button simulation, and programmable zoom and exposure adjustment based on hardcoded parameters. I have some of these commands working, but other ones can be found in the EDSDK that I will provide as part of the codebase.

  Key Requirements:

  - Debug and improve camera control functionality including:
    - Camera wake-up sequences
    - Shutter button control for taking photos
    - Programmatic exposure adjustment via parameters
    - Handling camera power cycling gracefully
    - Proper image saving and interaction with other script components
  - Add ability to set camera to specific zoom levels
  - Create modular code structure in camera_control_service.py for easy addition of future EDSDK commands
  - Implement proper threading for camera operations (using Windows COM STA)
  - Provide clean, informative terminal output for users

  Essential Qualifications:
  - MUST own or have access to a Canon camera for your own local testing (ideally a Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark III)
  - Must use Windows as development environment
  - Experience with Canon EDSDK or similar camera control SDKs
  - Strong Python programming skills with experience in hardware integration
  - Experience with multi-threaded applications
  - Understanding of proper resource management for hardware devices
  - Git version control
  - Knowledge of AI LLMs (for code review, commit messages, PRs, and regular communications)

  Additional Information:

  - Code access will be provided on an as-needed basis
  - Thorough testing and documentation is required
  - Communication in English is essential

  Expected Deliverables:

  - Debugged and improved camera control script
  - Implementation of zoom level control
  - Documentation of changes and usage
  - Testing report demonstrating all functionality works
  - Daily status updates, clear communication via messages, screenshots, screen recordings, and/or video calls
  - Signed NDA etc. for access to codebase

title: Two-Story Bar and Restaurant Design for Hotel in Togo
description: We are seeking a skilled designer to create a contemporary two-story bar and restaurant layout for a mid-size hotel in Togo. The design should maximize space efficiency while ensuring an inviting atmosphere for guests. Proposals should include floor plans, furniture and material suggestions (a few style visuals to share would be fine, along with a bar section and plan, and a review of the existing kitchen). Experience in restaurant and hospitality design is essential. Please provide a portfolio showcasing previous bar and restaurant projects. Client is experienced builder. Design project should take no less than 2 weeks. Looking forward to working with you!

title: Shopify/ e-commerce product sourcing & management
description:
Title:
E-commerce Product Sourcing & Store Manager – Health & Pet Industry (Shopify)

Description:
I’m looking to hire a reliable and experienced Shopify product sourcing and store management specialist to help grow two niche e-commerce brands: one in the health & wellness industry and the other in the pet supplies space. You should have hands-on experience with Shopify, product research, supplier communication, and overall store operations.

This is a long-term role for someone who understands e-commerce trends, can find winning products, and manage them effectively within a Shopify environment.

Responsibilities:

Conduct product research and identify trending, high-demand products in the health/wellness and pet categories
Source products from reliable suppliers (AliExpress, Alibaba, private suppliers, etc.)
Upload and optimize product listings (titles, descriptions, images, pricing)
Manage inventory and coordinate with suppliers for timely fulfillment
Set up product bundles, upsells, and cross-sells to improve AOV
Oversee daily operations: order tracking, customer service coordination, and refunds/returns
Work closely with the development team to maintain a high-converting store layout
Monitor product performance and suggest removals, additions, or improvements
Ensure compliance with all product regulations and Shopify policies
Requirements:

Experience with Shopify and product sourcing tools (DSers, Zendrop, CJdropshipping, etc.)
Deep understanding of the health & wellness and/or pet industries
Strong skills in product description writing and store organization
Excellent communication and organizational skills
Fluent in English
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Preferred but Not Required:

Experience with private labeling or working with U.S.-based suppliers
Familiarity with basic analytics (Google Analytics, Shopify reports, etc.)
Knowledge of SEO and e-commerce marketing strategies
To Apply:
Please send:

A short summary of your relevant experience
Shopify or e-commerce stores you’ve managed or sourced products for
Your favorite tools for sourcing and managing products
Your availability and H^hourly^H or monthly rate

title: Social Media Visuals & Client Management Support
description: We are seeking a versatile freelancer to assist with creating engaging Instagram images, maintaining our website, and developing client proposals. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for design, a good understanding of website management, and experience with CRM systems. You will play a crucial role in enhancing our online presence and streamlining client interactions. If you have a passion for visual content and organizational skills, we want to hear from you!

title: WordPress + Blocksy + TutorLMS Developer Needed to Finalize LMS Platform, Design Course pages
description:
Job Title:

WordPress Developer Needed to Finalize LMS Platform (Tutor LMS + Blocksy) + Design Course & Site Pages

Overview:

We’re building an education and creation platform. Our LMS is built on WordPress with Tutor LMS Pro + Blocksy Pro, and we’re now looking for a developer to finalize the platform, polish the UI, design key course pages and content sections, and help us prepare for public launch.

This is a short-term milestone-based role (2 weeks) with opportunity for long-term collaboration.

Scope of Work

1. LMS Setup Completion (Tutor LMS Pro + Blocksy Pro)
•	Complete course structure, quiz logic, and enrollment flows
•	Configure certificates & badges module
•	Style learner dashboard and instructor dashboard
•	Implement instructor onboarding and application form

2. Course Page Design
•	Create template-based course pages (1920×1080 thumbnail support)
•	Build and populate 20 course pages this week + 10 next week (30 total)
•	Ensure course pages are responsive and visually consistent

3. Homepage & Site Pages
•	Finalize homepage (content provided)
•	Style and implement:
o	About Us
o	Become an Instructor
o	Features & Benefits
o	Certificates & Badges
o	Onboarding Page
o	Progress Tracker
o	Instructor Dashboard

4. Documentation & Help Center
•	Set up a clean knowledge base / FAQ site on support subdomain
•	Populate it with provided content
•	Ensure search, categories, and links work intuitively

5. General UI/UX Polish
•	Apply brand fonts, icons, and layout spacing
•	Ensure responsiveness across devices (desktop, tablet, mobile)
•	Suggest UX improvements if necessary
•	Stripe billing logic has been started → need to finalize enrollment/payment flow and restrict access by user role
•	Integrate PayPal
•	Integrate tools like WP Rocket and FluentSMTP 

 Tools in Use:
•	WordPress (Cloudways VPS)
•	Tutor LMS Pro
•	Blocksy Pro
•	Stripe
•	PayPal
•	WP Rocket
•	Fluent Forms + SMTP

Ideal Candidate:
•	Experience building LMS platforms using Tutor LMS or similar
•	Strong front-end design skills using Blocksy or custom CSS
•	Familiar with Stripe integration (course enrollment logic)
•	Can handle structured layout design for content-heavy pages
•	Detail-oriented and able to follow provided specs & brand docs

Timeline:
•	Start: Immediately
•	Delivery: Within 2 weeks for full scope
•	Must be available for check-ins and milestones

 
Budget Range:
•	$700–$1,000 USD total, depending on speed, quality, and experience
•	Open to milestone-based or H^fixed^H-price agreement
 
To Apply:

Please share:
1.	Your experience with Tutor LMS and WordPress-based LMS builds
2.	Portfolio of LMS or education websites you’ve built
3.	Preferred rate and timeline
4.	Whether you work independently or as part of a team

title: Full Stack Developer for Multi-Client App with Node, Nest, NX and Next
description:
We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our small team in building a multi-client application that automates Matter-enabled devices. The ideal candidate will have experience with Node.js, NestJS, NX, and Next.js, and must be a self-starter capable of working independently. You will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining the application, collaborating closely with team members to deliver innovative solutions. It is our expectation that you will utilize AI, but you must not depend on it. If you are passionate about full stack development and eager to make an impact, we want to hear from you!

Working hours must partially overlap with CDT timezone

title: Jr. Account Manager / Client Services Manager
description:
(Eastern Time | English Fluency Required)
We’re a fast-growing sales and marketing agency looking for a highly organized, proactive Jr. Account Manager to support our client experience, project coordination, and internal operations.

This is a long-term opportunity with potential for growth and promotion as our agency expands. You’ll work closely with clients and our internal team to ensure projects stay on track and communication flows smoothly.

You must be available to work during U.S. Eastern Time Zone hours (Monday–Friday) and be fluent in English, both written and spoken.

Key Responsibilities:

Key Responsibilities:
Act as the main point of contact for assigned clients

Monitor inboxes daily and respond or escalate as needed

Help manage timelines, deliverables, and approvals

Perform quality checks on content before it goes live (emails, ads, designs, etc.)

Help onboard new clients (gather logins, set up systems, support intake)

Coordinate with internal teams to ensure client goals are met

Assist with reporting and results tracking

Support internal operational tasks as needed

Bonus if you have:

Graphic design experience (Canva, Adobe, etc.)

Social media content creation or scheduling experience

Familiarity with email platforms or CRM tools (e.g., Go High Level, etc)

Basic marketing knowledge or background

Ideal Candidate:

Fluent in English (written and verbal)

Available during Eastern Time Zone hours

Excellent communication (written and verbal)

Highly organized with attention to detail

Comfortable working with multiple clients/projects at once

Problem-solver who takes initiative and follows through

Team player who can wear multiple hats when needed

title: Backend Development for Complex Lovable Project
description:
We're seeking an experienced backend developer to transform our sophisticated Lovable-built frontend into a fully functional community platform called Soularis. The ideal candidate will architect and implement complex backend systems that power our experience-sharing marketplace, connecting guides, explorers, and venues.

Primary Responsibilities:
Design and implement a robust database schema that supports our multi-role user system (guides, explorers, haven owners)
Develop comprehensive APIs for our journey booking system with complex availability scheduling (weekly, bi-weekly, monthly patterns)
Create a scalable real-time messaging system between platform users
Build a dynamic social feed with content filtering, friend relationships, and activity-based recommendations
Integrate authentication, user profiles, and permission systems
Design efficient data access patterns to support our tribe/community relationship features
Engineer backend logic for venue/haven management and availability

Technical Requirements:
Proven experience building complex scheduling and calendar systems
Strong knowledge of real-time communication protocols (WebSockets, etc.) for messaging features
Experience implementing social network-style feeds with filtering and recommendation systems
Proficiency with relational databases and designing efficient schemas for complex relationship data
Background in developing secure booking and payment workflows
Experience with performance optimization for concurrent user interactions
Familiarity with cloud infrastructure, API design, and authentication systems

The Ideal Candidate:
Has built and scaled community platforms or marketplace applications
Understands the technical complexities of scheduling and availability management
Can architect systems that gracefully handle relationships between users in different roles
Demonstrates a thoughtful approach to database design and API architecture
Communicates effectively about technical decisions and tradeoffs
Is passionate about building technologies that foster meaningful connections between people

If you're excited about building the backend that powers a platform for shared experiences and community building, we'd love to talk with you about bringing the Soularis vision to life.

title: Bilingual Marketing Specialist for Latino Business in Detroit
description: We are seeking a bilingual (Spanish/English) marketing specialist to help promote our mailbox, packing, and shipping business located in a Latino neighborhood in Detroit, MI.  Our current landing page is https://postaltotal.com/. The ideal candidate will assist with translation services, develop an effective SEO strategy, and create a comprehensive marketing plan tailored to our target audience. Your expertise will help us increase visibility and drive customer engagement in our community. If you are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and have a strong understanding of marketing strategies in bilingual environments, we would love to hear from you. We are looking to hire someone immediately, as we aim to open in late June/early July.

title: Marketing Data Analyst (Looker Studio + BigQuery) – Dashboard & Metrics Expert
description:
We are looking for a Marketing Data Analyst to partner with our corporate marketing team in managing data pipelines, creating dashboards, and delivering actionable insights. This role is ideal for someone who understands the full digital marketing funnel, is data-obsessed, and knows how to bring clarity through reporting.

If you're experienced in Looker Studio, Google BigQuery, and tools like Optimizely and Fullstory, this is a great opportunity to make an immediate impact.

Responsibilities:

Manage and structure marketing data from platforms such as Google Ads, LinkedIn, HubSpot, GA4, Optimizely, Fullstory, and others

Design and maintain insightful, user-friendly dashboards in Looker Studio (formerly Data Studio)

Write efficient SQL queries in Google BigQuery to clean, model, and analyze data

Monitor key metrics including CAC, ROAS, CPL, MQL flow, A/B test performance, and user behavior insights

Support experimentation and CRO efforts by integrating Optimizely and Fullstory data into reporting workflows

Partner with marketing stakeholders to deliver ad hoc and recurring insights

Troubleshoot data issues, ensure data quality, and optimize reporting processes

Requirements:

Hands-on experience with Looker Studio and Google BigQuery

Strong understanding of digital marketing metrics and KPIs

Familiarity with performance data from Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, GA4, HubSpot

Experience analyzing A/B testing results from Optimizely

Comfortable working with session replay and behavioral analytics from Fullstory

Excellent SQL skills and understanding of marketing funnel analytics

Strong attention to detail and a problem-solving mindset

Nice to Have:

Experience with tagging setup and event tracking via GTM/GA4

Exposure to CRM or marketing automation platforms (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot)

Experience with Python or ETL tools to automate workflows

Project Details:

Part-time, with potential for long-term or H^ongoing^H engagement

Remote / Flexible hours

Start date: ASAP

title: Excel Expert Needed Who Can Teach Excel
description: We are looking for a talented Excel expert who is adept at all of the functions and features to help teach our team members how to use advanced features of Excel and Google Spreadsheets such as macros and VBA. We're looking for someone with outstanding oral English skills who is available nights and weekends US time as well if needed. Must be willing to sign an NDA.

title: B2B lead gen & sales
description:
I’m the CEO of DockCharged,  and easy to install energy meter company with a recurring software revenue platform. 

The problem that we solve is that businesses with many tenants have to lose money on electricity and with our technology, we helped the business, save money by reducing energy consumption, but also recuperating any loss of capital through energy from their tenants.

We have landed multiple large clients in Latin America and now we are looking to scale in the United States. We serve customers in the field of, including when not limited to food courts, food, truck park, core housing, spaces, apartment, electric car, charging, and many more.

We are looking for a very experienced advertising expert that has expertise in google, Facebook, LinkedIn ads. Where aiming to generate more leads and close more deals for Dockcharged in the next two months and hoping to grow quickly. We have happy customers in Latin America and our goal is to grow our business in America.

I am looking for someone to help generate more inbound sales leads, and open to suggestions. We are looking for someone that can formally a plan and help executed.

In your response, please tell us how you would accomplish our goals and what would you do?

title: Taxi App Already Built for previous customers. NO NEW APP TO BUILD!
description:
!!! PLEASE READ THIS:
"WE ONLY NEED A PROVIDER WHO ALREADY BUILT ON APP FOR CUSTOMER"
Communication will be established with privider who SEND AS A APP THEY BUILT IT. 
WE HAVE NO TIME TO WAIT FOR BUILDING. THANKS!!

We are seeking a skilled developer who already design and develop a comprehensive taxi app. 
Taxi APP  Design and develop  

• Give source code for both Android and iOS for user app
• Give source code for both Android and iOS apps for backend code


Backend set up with database link with Connect app with server and hosting

• Rebrand Apps Like:    
• Change name
• Logo of app
• Terms conditions
• All required information
• Change App package name
• Link app with firebase
• Upload app at Google and Apple stores


• Set the admin panel
• Provide the complete system (taxi system application on both IOS and android store with  guideline on how to use and to be tested with the Project owner.


Note: The scope of work will be a TAXI APP. There are two types of vehicles (Car & SUV) with the main subjects  as follows: (assigning codes, design, logo modification, full control panel, uploading on Android and iOS stores,booking, financial integration with card linking, testing, and complete handover, etc. If the work is not completed, the Project Owner reserves the right to request a reject and refund  the payment for the entire project, as the incomplete work will be of no use to the owner. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Consultant on online course creation, launch and marketing
description: Looking for a consultant on creating and selling digital products/an online course for home-service based industry (landscaping.) Must have proven, high-level success with online courses and structure.

title: Interior Design Mockup for New Döner Kebab Brand
description:
We’re launching a new fast-casual döner kebab brand and are looking for a talented interior designer or design studio to help us define the look and feel of our flagship store. This is a conceptual design-only project — no technical layout, equipment lists, or architectural drawings needed.

Scope of Work (Design-Only):
- Visual direction + mood board based on our brand identity
- Suggested materials, lighting, signage, and finishes
- 2–3 high-quality 3D renderings (interior + street view)
- Visual inspiration and guidance we can give to future build partners

Space Overview:
- Type: Street-front store
- Size: Approx. 70–90 m²
- Concept: Urban kebab shop with strong lunch and delivery traffic, plus nighttime walk-ins

Design Style:
We want a space that blends modern street food energy with Turkish artisanal roots.

Think:
- Warm, urban lighting
- Clean lines + textured walls
- Strong signage + bold colors
- Industrial meets handcrafted

Visual inspiration:
- Haus des Döner (Germany)
- German Doner Kebab (UK)
- Doner Shack (UK)

QSR layout simplicity of Sweetgreen or Shake Shack

What You’ll Deliver:
- Design mood board (materials, finishes, style)
- 2–3 polished 3D visualizations/renderings

Optional: Suggested fonts, signage styles, or design cues to guide branding and build

What We’re Looking For:
- Experience with hospitality, QSR, or retail concepts
- Strong eye for urban food branding + interior atmosphere
- Ability to work quickly and collaboratively (remote OK)
- Proficiency in SketchUp, Lumion, Blender, or similar tools

To Apply:
Please send:
- Portfolio of relevant projects
- H^Fixed^H price quote
- Estimated timeline
- Software/tools you’ll use

title: E-commerce Website Design Audit for BigCommerce
description: We are seeking an experienced web auditor to evaluate our existing e-commerce site built on BigCommerce. The ideal candidate will analyze the website's design, user experience, and functionality, providing actionable recommendations to enhance our online store's performance and aesthetic appeal. Your insights will help us improve customer engagement and increase conversion rates. A background in e-commerce best practices and familiarity with BigCommerce is essential. Please include examples of previous audits or web design improvements in your application.

title: Quality Assurance Specialist (Wix)
description:
Hi! 

We are a small agency that engineers custom code solutions for WiX websites. We are looking for a Quality Assurance Specialist to join our QA team, test websites and assure that they fulfill the client's requirements/ identify bugs. (From a design, UX, functionality perspective)

Requirements:
- QA experience.
- Project management skills.
- Ability to test on multiple devices and screen sizes
- Attention to detail.
- Wix experience- 1 year.

Workload:
Training period: 3-5 hours a week.
After full onboarding: 5-10 hours a week (may increase)

Please start your proposal with "WIXQA".

Thanks!

title: Website Restoration from Wayback Machine and GoDaddy Setup
description: We are seeking a skilled freelancer to restore our website using the Wayback Machine and set it up on GoDaddy hosting. The ideal candidate should have experience with website recovery, HTML/CSS coding, and domain management. You will be responsible for retrieving archived content, ensuring all pages are functional, and properly configuring the website on our GoDaddy account. Attention to detail and knowledge of web hosting practices are essential for this project.

title: Vision Pro Meditation Environment in Unreal Engine 5.5+
description:
***Please see asset descriptions in attached RFP

Overview:
We’re creating a minimalist meditation app for Apple Vision Pro. The user sits or stands in a
small radius within a photorealistic natural environment (assets provided), while ambient
soundtrack, music, and voiceover play over subtle scene animations.
This brief covers Phase 1, focused on building and testing the immersive environment in
Unreal Engine 5.5+ with deployment via TestFlight and high-quality rendering (up to 8K).

title: Facebook Ads for Mobile Home Flipper
description:
I am a mobile home flipper. That means I buy, fix, and resell mobile homes.

I have a large list of mobile home owners, and I want to use their email addresses to target them on Facebook using Facebook ads.

I'm looking for someone with the background and experience might be help me achieve a lot of leads. I want to find people who want to sell their mobile homes for cash.

title: 📰 Newsletter Marketing Manager (Remote, Part-Time or Contract)
description:
Company: Pre-IPO Hype
Location: Remote
Position: Newsletter Program Owner
Commitment: Part-Time, Freelance, or Retainer
Compensation: $1,500–$4,000/H^month^H depending on experience

📣 About Us
Pre-IPO Hype is a performance-driven fundraising agency helping startups raise capital through equity crowdfunding. We’ve led over 200+ campaigns and are now building a world-class newsletter to spotlight founders, decode investor trends, and drive capital formation at scale.

We’re looking for a Newsletter Marketing Manager to run point on our entire newsletter operation—from content strategy and production to distribution and performance optimization.

✍️ What You'll Own
As the architect and operator of our investor-focused newsletter, you’ll:

Run the Newsletter Engine: Own the calendar, production process, and weekly publishing of a longform (~3,000–4,000 word) investor newsletter

Lead Editorial Strategy: Map themes, develop outlines, and source founder stories or investment insights

Edit + Refine Longform Content: Work with writing partners (or AI agents) to ensure voice, clarity, compliance, and flow

Manage Distribution Channels: Use GoHighLevel (GHL) and ConvertKit to manage lists, segmentation, A/B testing, and deliverability

Coordinate Contributor Pipeline: Collaborate with our CEO, analysts, and campaign leads to collect story inputs and market insights

Drive Growth Loops: Set up referral systems, email-gated lead magnets, and social clip tie-ins to boost subscriber growth

Track Performance: Build simple dashboards to monitor open rates, CTR, growth rate, campaign response, and churn

🔍 What We’re Looking For
3–5+ years in newsletter marketing, editorial strategy, or investor content

Proven success building or running newsletters (Substack, ConvertKit, GHL, Beehiiv, etc.)

Exceptional editorial judgment and ability to polish longform, high-caliber writing

Familiarity with investor audiences and capital markets (angel, Reg CF, VC)

Operational mindset: can systematize content creation, feedback, and publishing

Comfort working with AI tools (GPT, Relevance AI) to accelerate editorial workflows

Bonus: background in finance, startup media, or creator marketing

💻 Tools You'll Use
GoHighLevel (GHL) – email marketing, list segmentation, drip campaigns

ConvertKit / Substack / Beehiiv – for optional expansion/testing

Notion or Airtable – editorial calendar & workflow

Grammarly / ChatGPT / Claude / Jasper – content refinement

Fathom / Fireflies – note-taking and insight extraction

Google Analytics / GHL Dashboards – performance tracking

📆 Engagement Details
Remote + async friendly

5–10 hrs/week (varies by publishing cadence)

$1,500–$4,000/H^month^H depending on experience and volume

Initial 3-H^month^H contract with opportunity to expand to editorial lead

🚀 How to Apply
Email the following to [insert hiring email]:

1–2 links to newsletters you’ve run (or written for)

A paragraph on how you’d structure a weekly investor-focused newsletter

Your favorite newsletter of all time (and why)

Subject Line: Newsletter Manager – [Your Name]

title: Advertising & Hospitality Sales Professional (Virginia/Mid-Atlantic Region)
description:
About Us:
The African American Heritage Association of Virginia (AAHA! Virginia) and the African American Heritage Tourism Network (AAHTN) are nonprofit and community-centered initiatives dedicated to elevating African American heritage through curated travel experiences, digital engagement, print and multimedia publishing, and collaborative economic development.

We operate a high-visibility media platform—including Soul of Virginia Magazine, AAHA Journal, monthly newsletters, travel guides, loyalty programs, and commemorative cultural events—serving audiences throughout Virginia and the Mid-Atlantic region.

Position Overview:
We seek a dynamic, self-motivated sales professional with a background in advertising, media sales, or hospitality/tourism marketing. This individual will drive ad sales and sponsorship engagement across our integrated platforms and events while cultivating strong relationships with local businesses, destination marketing organizations (DMOs), hotels, restaurants, and tourism partners (both Virtual and brick-and-mortar).

Key Responsibilities:
	•	Secure advertising and sponsorship contracts for:
	•	Soul of Virginia Magazine (Bi-monthly)
	•	AAHA Journal (Quarterly)
	•	Monthly digital newsletters and web platforms
	•	AAHTN travel loyalty campaigns and cultural events
	•	Develop and manage client relationships in tourism, hospitality, and cultural sectors
	•	Coordinate cross-promotional campaigns with strategic partners and advertisers
	•	Participate in regional trade events and networking opportunities
	•	Work with internal teams to align sales with editorial calendars and outreach campaigns
	•	Track and report on sales performance using CRM tools (training provided if needed)

Ideal Candidate:
	•	Based in Virginia or the surrounding Mid-Atlantic region
	•	3–5+ years of experience in media, tourism, or hospitality advertising sales
	•	Strong contacts with DMOs, hotel groups, restaurants, cultural venues, and local businesses
	•	Self-starter with excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills
	•	Familiarity with multicultural marketing and community-based tourism is a plus
	•	Comfortable working independently with weekly check-ins and remote collaboration

Compensation:
Commission-based with potential for performance bonuses, event participation stipends, and travel expense reimbursement. Contract or Commission-Based Opportunity | Immediate Start Preferred. The position is a long-term contract or full-time opportunity based on performance.

title: Need Electrical, Plumbing, and HVAC plans drawn
description: Need someone who can take my barndominium plans and draft electrical, havac, and plumbing portions of the plans.  I need this done ASAP.  Need to have experience drafting plans that meet standards and code.  The state I will be submitting these plans in is Ohio.   Preferably someone who has done plans in Ohio previously, but not required.  I do need an extremely quick turnaround this.  My H^fixed^H price is an estimate, so please let me know absolute price when you reach out. Thank you.

title: Senior Java 17 Engineer – High-Performance Runtime Server (40 hrs/wk, Healthcare, Interoperability)
description:
Who we are

An 11,000-person U.S. healthcare software company. Our flagship runtime platform executes customer-designed data-exchange workflows at scale. We’re expanding our India team and can convert the right freelancer to a full-time employee.

⸻

What you’ll do

	•	Design, code and ship new features for a Java 17 server runtime (Spring 6 under the hood; OSGi legacy being phased out).
	•	Profile & fix low-latency, multithreaded performance issues and troubleshoot customer incidents.
	•	Modernize modules and the tech stack.
	•	Review merge requests and collaborate with U.S./India/Eastern Europe engineers.
	•	40 hrs/week, long-term engagement.

⸻

Core tech stack

Java 17 · Multithreading/Concurrency · Kafka & JMS · MS SQL Server / Oracle / Postgres · GitLab · Kubernetes · Spring 6
Bonus: AWS/Azure · FHIR/HL7

⸻

Must-have experience

	•	6+ years building enterprise back-end products that are secure, highly available and horizontally scalable.
	•	Advanced concurrency & performance tuning in Java.
	•	Designing and optimizing relational-DB data paths.

⸻

Nice-to-haves

Helm · AWS/Azure · OpenSearch/Elasticsearch · OAuth 2.0 · Healthcare interoperability (FHIR/HL7)

⸻

How we work

	•	Source control: GitLab
	•	Remote, flexible hours aligned with India / Eastern Europe time zones; 40 hrs/week
	•	Hiring process: technical screen → one panel interview.

⸻

Compensation

Target range $30 – $40/hr; please justify any higher rate with relevant achievements. Stretch is possible for an exceptional fit.

⸻

To apply — read carefully

	1.	Link to a public GitHub repo or attach a code sample that showcases multithreaded Java you authored.
	2.	In ≤ 150 words, describe the toughest multithreaded bug you solved in production and how you H^fixed^H it.
	3.	Confirm you are currently based in India and state your H^hourly^H rate & earliest start date.

Applications missing any of the three items will be skipped.
No agencies, please—we’re looking for an individual super-star engineer who loves hard performance problems and wants a stable, long-term role in healthcare tech.

title: Realtek rtl8188ftv Wireless Regulatory Test Driver on STM32MP1
description:
We are looking for an experienced developer to help us find and deliver regulatory test drivers for the Realtek rtl8188ftv wireless driver, specifically tailored for the STM32MP1 OpenSTLinux platform. 

The vendor supplied tool is also referred to as "MP Tool", it comprises of two parts- a user-space utility, and a kernel driver which has the specific test firmware that loads onto the chip. 

We have a user-space application provided by the manufacturer, but it does not work with the wifi kernel driver we are using.  We don't seem to have the correct kernel driver.

Successful completion of this project would be the ability to use the MP tool to set the chip in the right modes so we can do RF regulatory testing.   This should be a very quick project for someone who has done this before.

title: Memecoin Project: Website Builder & Social Media Manager Needed -Team or Inviduals
description: We are seeking talented individuals to join our memecoin project. Ideal candidates will have experience in building engaging websites tailored for Memecoin audiences and managing social media accounts to grow our community. Your role will involve creating and maintaining basic memecoin website,  createing and promoting socials, and crafting compelling content for various platforms. Familiarity with memecoin landscape and a passion for meme culture are essential. If you have a knack for creativity and strategic thinking, we want to hear from you!

title: Wordpress blog auto accidnet news feed with generated images and word spin
description:
I have website built. I would like to use the blog side of Wordpress to create news article of all car crashes in the state of Washington with our company information on each news post at the bottom. Also have it spin the article and generate new images  with deep.ai or any free images to make it ours and have a google map of the location and pin where the accident happened.
here is a example of a site that has this. ---sweetlaw.com/blog--
